main.name: Stephen Parker
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I’m a Portland, Oregon-based web developer who has a passion for creating pixel-perfect experiences that serve every type of user, no matter their ability, interest, or choice of device. Due to the ever-changing terrain of the tech landscape, I believe that an excellent web developer must take an ‘always-learning’ approach to new technologies and collaborations.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Learned industry best practices and practical software development standards with a focus on HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, React, Redux, and algorithms & data structures.
Expert training in audio engineering, mixing and mastering all within Pro Tools.

work.title: Junior Staff Developer
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.title: Staff Developer
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.title: Operations Director
work.description: As the Operations Director for a fast-growing cryptocurrency/Fintech conference based in North America, it's imperative for me to have an unparalleled skill for organizing. As a point-of-contact for both pre-event operations, as well as the day-of, my duties are vast and always-changing! Adapting to new environments, and processes is crucial to the success of a startup employee.

work.title: Operations Associate
work.description: As an operation associate I aide startups around the US in the logistical processes of their payroll, benefits, PTO, commission models, overarching operations, with an emphasis on startup technology.

work.title: Virtual Assistant
work.description: A remote position that enlists a virtual assistant to aid startups in anything I can take off their hands. In the startup world, it is crucial to find extra time to work on the product, or service, itself.

work.title: Executive/Research Assistant
work.description: As the executive assistant to the brilliant team at K Parks Consulting, my job is to make sure all things administrative run smoothly. Anything from booking travel and scheduling meetings, to data entry and quality checking expense reports.

projects.title: Maestus (2020)
projects.category: The 2020 official site for Portland, OR band Maestus.

projects.title: Glossolalia Records (2020)
projects.category: The 2020 re-design of the Glossolalia Records website.

projects.title: Contour
projects.category: Contour is an app that allows independent artists to plan, route, and book shows/tours! This app is currently in development progress!

projects.title: genriFy
projects.category: genriFy allows you to search Spotify for a specific genre, and return the top artists. This is a query that can help you discover new artists, while also revisiting the ones you already love!

projects.title: music.query
projects.category: music.Query is an app that allows you to test your music knowledge around rock and heavy metal artists. Test your knowledge now and see if you can get a perfect score!
